Uses of Interface
javax.security.enterprise.identitystore.PasswordHash

  • Packages that use PasswordHash 
    Package Description
    javax.security.enterprise.identitystore
    The identity store API package.

    • Uses of PasswordHash in javax.security.enterprise.identitystore

      Subinterfaces of PasswordHash in javax.security.enterprise.identitystore 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  Pbkdf2PasswordHash
      This interface represents the built-in Pbkdf2PasswordHash implementation.
      Methods in javax.security.enterprise.identitystore that return types with arguments of type PasswordHash 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends PasswordHash> hashAlgorithm()
      A PasswordHash implementation used to verify plaintext passwords by generating a hash of the password and comparing it against the hashed value returned from the database via the DatabaseIdentityStoreDefinition.callerQuery().
